reviews.text:
My grandma was placed in here for 1 month and one month only!!

It was horrible to the point, everyday I was in tears and wanted to collect her. In that short space of time she had clothes & money stolen. This was raised with management and nan was reimbursed with much bother. Should not of happened in the first place.
no care for nans belongings just dumped them in bin liners at the door when we moved her out, with odd shoes here and there. Her nails were long and she had other people’s clothes on every time we visited. Total disrespect.

AVOID!
reviews.author: J J

reviews.text: The staff are friendly, helpful & professional at all times. My Mum looks well cared for and relaxed. She always speaks well of her carers.
reviews.author: Sharon Gough

reviews.text: My Father had been in Kinross for over a year. He speaks highly of the staff and service.
reviews.author: Jason Phillips
